messages.message:
When the user opts into classification i.e. creates class and clicks on the 'Save and reclassify documents' button, we should automatically enable group by class for documents. This change is based on the feedback we've received around discoverability of group by and ability to see classes for documents by default.

@Serena @Arjun can you please help with this?
This should already be true and on aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com (http://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com), are you seeing something different?

Also for feedback like this it might be better to post in <#C05EQQJGN7L|>. This channel is pretty high traffic and so for specific change requests from the design side itâ€™ll have more visibility in that build specific channel
nvm, just tried and it works!! :thankyou:
